Articles.Content:
Its payload is way to big to fit in any fairings, it wobbles, and it\'s ugly as hell, but ohh boy is it fun!

After much testing here it is, think we finally got enough struts on so it won\'t self destruct .... most the time. Consider this my plea for working wheels and smoother moon textures lol, I had to share this tho it has been hours of fun for me.

http://www.metacafe.com/w/8149414 - heres a vid of me running a short demo with it, sorry for using metacafe I know its slow but YouTube decided to yank my audio I don\'t think Ozzy will mind

Heres the 'short' list of Mods you need to load this thing up (-version at release)

-C7FlightPack (2.16)

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=1172.0

-NovaPunch Remix Pack (1.0 Alpha)

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4180.0

-Industrial Flames and Explosions (1.4.1)

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=3684.0

-Down Under Aerospace & Party Supplies (0.4)

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=3362.0

-OKAD Rover Wheels

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4267.0

-Lander Peg (1.0) & Radial Booster Pack (2.2) by CaptainSlug

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=2251.0

Have fun all hopefully this all posted correctly, .craft file should be attached.

p.s. Sorry about low res video, best I can do with Fraps until I get a second HD and secondly I forgot to mention, I wouldn\'t recommend exceeding 20 m/s with rover or things can become ... er self destructive

Built in KSP v13.1
Munstrosity? That is a brilliant name for a ship

LoL thank you I thought it was quite fitting, and honestly surprised it hadn\'t been used. Sorry for no pics figured the video was better since staging gets kinda weird unloading the rover. But I did go get a few so here they are.

Take Off:

No self destructive dismount yay!:

Rover Fun (watch those pesky texture seams!):

After engine is ejected we go upright for the ride home (careful to save a little RCS for this step):

Dump the junk and get off this rock! (more than enough fuel for return trip):

There ya go for those that don\'t want to mess with video
